name: ReverseCounter
0:
”Alexa, ask reverse counter to start from 30”
”Start from 45”
”open 20”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverse counter
des:
The "Reverse Counter" is reverse countdown from 60 to 0.
The user can choose any number from 60 to 1 to start the reverse timer.
Alexa will start counting from the number chosen to zero.

For example, users can say "Alexa, ask reverse counter start from 30" or "Alexa, ask reverse counter count down from 60" or "Alexa, open reverse counter"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
